definitions: to make someone happier. it is a kind of make happy. it is not to make sad.
a sweet thing made from fruit. it can be eaten with bread. it is not liquid.
a place where bones meet. it allows movement. it is part of the body.
to become part of something. it makes people or things together. it is a way to connect.
a liquid. it comes from fruits. it can be sweet or sour.
to move up and down quickly. it can happen when someone is not steady. it makes a sound.
a trip. it can take time and move from one place to another. it has a start and an end.
a work that a person does. it can pay money. it is part of life.
a thing that makes people laugh. it can be said or written. it is not serious.
a good feeling. it is not sad. it makes people smile.
a person. to decide what is right or wrong. not a friend.
a thing that a person does to earn money. it can be work or a task. it makes a person have a role.
to join. it means to become part of something. it can happen when people or things connect.
a way of speaking. it is not serious. it makes people laugh.
a piece of clothing. it covers the body and arms. it can be made of different materials.
to move up and down quickly. it can happen when someone is not standing. it makes a person leave the ground.
a person. a man that has power to decide cases. it can make rules.
a part of the body. it connects two bones. it can move.
to join: to come together with others. it can make a group. it is a way to connect.
